g.text: Initiates the request to check the pending task assigned to him
[if the user pretends to filter the search by the available fields]
Displays the available task filter fields
[if the user pretends to filter the search by the available fields]
Displays the available task order fields
[if user didnt pretend to filter or order the search]
[if user pretended to filter the search]
[if user pretended to order the search]
[if user pretended to filter and order the search]
[if user didnt pretend to filter or order the search]
[if user pretended to filter the search]
[if user pretended to order the search]
[if user pretended to filter and order the search]
